text:
Heather Mary Peace (born 16 June 1975) is an English actress, musician and LGBT rights activist. She was born in Bradford, England.
She is best known for her hit roles as Nikki Boston in the BBC One school-based drama series, "Waterloo Road", from 2012 until 2014; Sally 'Gracie' Fields in the ITV's long-running series, "London's Burning"; Fiona Murray in the Kay Mellor drama series, "The Chase"; and Sam Murray in the BBC Scotland drama series, "Lip Service".
